| HistoryText             = The '''[[All-Mother]] of [[Asgardia]]''' are a trinity of Asgardian goddesses that have taken the [[Odin Borson (Earth-616)|All-Father]]'s place ruling [[Asgard]], following his self-exile and abdication following the [[Cul Borson (Earth-616)|Serpent]]'s [[Fear Itself|rampage]].{{r|Mighty Thor Vol 2 8}}

These three goddesses represented different aspects of a women's life and have titles to match: Compassionate [[Gaea (Earth-616)|Gaea]], the Mother; Imperial [[Freyja Freyrdottir (Earth-616)|Freyja]], the Queen; Youthful [[Idunn (Earth-616)|Idunn]], the Maiden.{{r|Fear Itself #7.2}}

As Asgardia left Broxton and Midgard, Freyja took her place as the one true All-Mother, while Idunn was sent to scout for new homes along the World Tree for the Asgardians and Gaea stayed on Earth.{{r|Thor: God of Thunder #24}}
